name: Gangsta Pat
description: '''Patrick Alexander Hall''' (born November 17, 1973) better known by his stage name '''Gangsta Pat''', is an American [[rapping|rapper]] from [[Memphis, Tennessee]] who established himself in the [[Memphis rap]] scene during the late 1980s and 1990s.  Gangsta Pat is also one of the first rap artists from the city to make the move from an [[Independent record label|indie]] label to a [[major label]] when signing to [[Atlantic records]] during the start of the [[gangsta rap]] era. He wrote, produced, and played all of the instruments on his early releases. is the son of [[Stax Records]] drummer, [[Willie Hall (drummer)|Willie Hall]].
